summary:
How marine permaculture can regenerate 70% of the Earth surface, the oceans, according to Brian Von Herzen, executive director of the Climate Foundation and original founder of the Marine Permaculture Movement.

FULL INTERVIEW: www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2020/01/09/brian-von-herzen/.

With Brian Von Herzen we discussed why kelp, seaweed and ocean regeneration are ready for their breakthrough. Climate Foundation’s marine permaculture technology has the potential to provide sustainable food, feed, fiber, fertilizer, and biofuels on a global scale, all while enabling carbon export from the atmosphere.
